meanings.definition: Inform (someone) of something, typically in an official manner.
meanings.sent1: I notified my friend about the party tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The school notified parents about the upcoming field trip.
meanings.sent3: The cat notified the dog about the new toy.
meanings.sent4: The sun notified the world of the dawn's arrival.
meanings.sent5: The loud alarm clock notified me that it was time to wake up.
